alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 6:35PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Taylor County through 715 PM EDT... At 635 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles west of Perry, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Perry, Scanlon, Econfina, Perry-Foley Airport, Bucell Junction, Cabbage Grove and Hampton Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor
